Source code for course


[docs]
class Course:
    """
    A class to represent a Course in the School Management System.

    The `Course` class manages course-related information such as the course name, 
    the assigned instructor, and the students enrolled in the course. 

    Attributes:
        course_name (str): The name of the course.
        instructor (Instructor, optional): The instructor assigned to the course. 
            Defaults to None if no instructor is assigned.
        enrolled_students (list): A list of students enrolled in the course.

    Methods:
        add_student(student):
            Adds a student to the course if they are not already enrolled.
    """

    def __init__(self, course_name, instructor=None):
        """
        Constructs all the necessary attributes for the Course object.

        Args:
            course_name (str): The name of the course.
            instructor (Instructor, optional): An optional Instructor object representing 
                the instructor assigned to this course. Defaults to None.
        """
        self.course_name = course_name
        self.instructor = instructor  # Instructor object or None if not assigned
        self.enrolled_students = []  # List of students enrolled in this course



[docs]
    def add_student(self, student):
        """
        Adds a student to the course if they are not already enrolled.

        This method checks if the student is already enrolled in the course.
        If not, the student is added to the list of enrolled students.

        Args:
            student (Student): An instance of the Student class representing 
                the student to be added to the course.

        Raises:
            ValueError: If the student is already enrolled in the course.
        """
        if student not in self.enrolled_students:
            self.enrolled_students.append(student)
